name: Shooties
description:
Fight the Clams (yeah I know a dumb name... AND THAT'S WHY YOU WANT TO KILL THEM!) Keep an eye on your ammo, You don't want to run out!

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Use Mouse to look
  • Press E to enter helicopter
  • Press R to reload
  • Caps-Lock For Slow Motion

Made By ima personsz in 1 Day

Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/shoots/365175
